catalog.description: Development of interpersonal and presentational speaking skills in Spanish at the ACTFL Intermediate Low to Intermediate Mid level. For students at the SPAN 106 level or equivalent.
catalog.note: Native Spanish speakers and Spanish-speaking returned missionaries CANNOT take this course. Can be taken with SPAN 105/106. Will not count toward Spanish major or minor.
catalog.title: Spanish Conversation for High Beginners 2.

course_headers.header_text: SPAN 112R: Can be taken with SPAN 105/106. Returned missionaries and native Spanish speakers CANNOT take this course.
